languages.text: "Вы давите на самое больное место, Ваша Светлость — на казну. Мои товарищи очень огорчатся, если я испорчу наши отношения. Боюсь, вы не оставляете мне иного выхода, кроме как согласиться".

traits.locale_text: "Вы давите на самое больное место, Ваша Светлость — на казну. Мои товарищи очень огорчатся, если я испорчу наши отношения. Боюсь, вы не оставляете мне иного выхода, кроме как согласиться".
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."

languages.text: “你这可说到点子上了，尊贵的大人。如果我破坏了咱们之间的关系，那我的生意伙伴恐怕会非常失望。看来，我别无选择，只能帮这个忙了。”
languages.original_text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."

traits.locale_text: “你这可说到点子上了，大人。如果我破坏了咱们之间的关系，那我的伙伴恐怕会非常失望。看来，我别无选择，只能帮这个忙了。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「陛下は一番痛い部分をついてきますね。つまり、財布ですよ。私達の関係が壊れてしまえば、仲間もガッカリするでしょう。私には『はい』と答えるしか、選択肢はなさそうですね」
languages.original_text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下は一番痛い部分をついてきますね。つまり、財布ですよ。私達の関係が壊れてしまえば、仲間もガッカリするでしょう。私には『はい』と答えるしか、選択肢はなさそうですね」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Está dando en lo más vulnerable, mi{mf|lord|lady}: el bolsillo. Mis compañeros se sentirán muy decepcionados si arruino nuestra relación. Me temo que no me deja otra opción que decir que sí».
languages.original_text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."

traits.locale_text: «Está dando en lo más vulnerable, mi{mf|lord|lady}, el tesoro. Mis compañeros se sentirán muy decepcionados si arruino nuestra relación. Me temo que no me deja otra opción que decir que sí».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Ihr übt Druck auf die empfindlichste Stelle aus, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft — die Tasche. Meine Kollegen wären sehr enttäuscht, wenn ich unsere Beziehung ruiniere. Ich fürchte, Ihr lasst mir keine andere Wahl, als Ja zu sagen."
languages.original_text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr übt Druck auf die empfindlichste Stelle aus, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft — die Schatzkammer. Meine Kollegen wären sehr enttäuscht, wenn ich unsere Beziehung ruiniere. Ich fürchte, Ihr lasst mir keine andere Wahl, als Ja zu sagen."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Vous mettez la pression sur le point le plus sensible, Votre Seigneurie : le porte-monnaie. Les membres de mon équipage seraient très déçus si notre relation prenait fin par ma faute, ce qui veut dire que je n'ai pas d'autre choix que d'accepter votre demande. »
languages.original_text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."

traits.locale_text: « Vous mettez la pression sur le point le plus sensible, Votre Seigneurie : la trésorerie. Les membres de mon équipage seraient très déçus si notre relation prenait fin par ma faute, ce qui veut dire que je n'ai pas d'autre choix que d'accepter votre demande. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Sen de en hassas yerimden vuruyorsun be {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Cebimiz yanacak demek. Aramız bozulursa dostlarım çok üzülür. Korkarım bana başka seçenek bırakmıyorsun, anlaştık."
languages.original_text: "You're putting pressure on the most vulnerable spot, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship — the pocket. My fellows will be very disappointed if I ruin our relationship. I'm afraid you leave me no other option but to say yes."
